Key Arguments: The submission expresses a strong opposition to the government's authority to control basic rights such as land ownership, food production, and freedom of speech.
The author believes that the government should not have the power to determine what constitutes misinformation and disinformation.
The submission criticizes the proposed legislation as a Marxist/Communistic approach to governing.
Notable Quotes: What authority does any democratic Government have to remove the basic rights of its sovereign people...
As an unelected body, you do not have the right to censorship or to determine what is misinformation and disinformation...
I will never condone, accept nor comply with such a ridiculously Marxist/Communistic approach to Governing.
